access: Members of the Firebrands at the rank of second mark or higher have access to this feat.
markdown:
**Source** [Firebrands](/Sources.aspx?ID=196) pg. 79 **Archetype** [Celebrity](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=54) **Prerequisites** [Celebrity Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1931) **Access** Members of the Firebrands at the rank of second mark or higher have access to this feat. **Trigger** An enemy within 30 feet damages you or succeeds at a skill check. --- Every Firebrand can recognize the skill of others, but you've turned it into an art you can wield in combat. You compliment a foe's form or technique, and your unexpected praise distracts them from their surroundings. Attempt a [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) check against that enemy's Will DC. Regardless of your result, they are temporarily immune to your Grudging Compliments for 10 minutes. **Critical Success** The target becomes [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) for 1 round.
**Success** The target becomes flat-footed against your attacks for 1 round.
name: Grudging Compliment
search_markdown:
<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Linguistic" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=101" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=144" />
</traits>

<additional-info>
<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Firebrands](/Sources.aspx?ID=196) pg. 79</row>

**Prerequisites**
[Celebrity Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1931)

**Access**
Members of the Firebrands at the rank of second mark or higher have access to this feat.

**Trigger**
An enemy within 30 feet damages you or succeeds at a skill check.

</additional-info>

---

<summary>
Every Firebrand can recognize the skill of others, but you've turned it into an art you can wield in combat.
</summary>
